text: @guyverhofstadt No Guy!  We want the EU to dissolve and disappear.  Nation states must approach the COVID-19 crisis as they see fit.  Having the EU support only a few members, while condemning others is just not going to work. You're deluded and a complete failure. Thank god for brexit!  See ya!
